body.p: If a server is unresponsive action should be taken to determine the cause and either fix the server or fail it over, depending on available replicas and the type of problem caused. The client SDK cannot determine if a server is unresponsive and by default assumes that any network or server failure is extremely temporary in nature and will attempt to reconnect as required.
